name: gocron
tagline: A self-hosted web interface and API for scheduling background jobs
description: GoCron is a self-hosted cron web UI and API for scheduling jobs. It offers job logs, history, a scheduler interface, and runs as a lightweight web server on local systems.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage cron jobs through an intuitive web interface instead of crontab files

features.title: Execution Logs
features.description: Capture stdout and stderr from job runs for debugging and monitoring

features.title: Job Management
features.description: Create, edit, enable, disable, and delete scheduled jobs from the UI

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatically manage jobs via REST API for automation and integration

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource requirements suitable for always-on operation

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts when jobs fail or complete successfully
